description.value:
Ammunition arrow, bolt

Activate 1 Interact

Silencing ammunition is particularly dense and seems to dampen sounds around it. On a successful Strike, an activated piece of silencing ammunition creates a 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Silence] effect on the target. The target can resist the effects of the ammunition with a successful @Check[type:will|dc:25|name:Remove or Resist Silence Effect] save, though it takes a -2 circumstance penalty if the Strike was a critical hit. While the effect is active, the target can use an Interact action to try to tug out the arrow or bolt and end the effect early; this requires a successful @Check[type:will|dc:25].
